Name: Planes, Bullets and Vodka
About the game: Planes, Bullets and Vodka is an infinite bullet hell game. Grab your manche with your right hand, your vodka with your left hand, and try to beat your own score or to get to the top of the online leaderboards. Perfect to play when you are in a queue for another game or when you want to get your name on the top of a leaderboards. This is a small, re-playable game, the objectives included are to beat your best score, to get on the leaderboards and get achievements. Multiple enemies to destroy, upgrades to get and vodka to drink! Based on oldschool SHMUP and bullet hells games, like River Raid, 1940, Space Invaders, Truxton, Galaga, etc. Survive as long as possible avoiding walls and enemies, on a increasingly difficult game. Get biggers scores by not missing enemies, for every 10 kill your multiplier increases, if 1 enemy pass, the multiplies return to 0. The level are constantly rising, so destroy the enemies early to get a bigger score. Addictive coin eater arcade experience. Great to play both with joystick or keyboard. Retro pixel art visual. 8 types of enemies, 3 power ups and VODKA. VODKA. Difficult increasing randomly generated path and enemies. 10 unique awesome tracks (and free soundtrack). Steam Leaderboards, achievements, cloud save and trading cards. 5 different languages (English, Português, Deutsche, русский, 中文). Hello, my name is Paulo and I'm the solo developer of Planes, Bullets and Vodka and the person behind NukGames. My objective is to bring small and re-playable games, with oldschool mechanics and improved gameplay to STEAM. Thanks for reading and I hope you'll enjoy Planes, Bullets and Vodka ! Paulo Brunassi - NukGames
